entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 07:28 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
